scripts.tag: npm run tag:load-balancer && npm run tag:api && npm run tag:headless && npm run tag:admin && npm run tag:marketing && npm run tag:storefront && npm run tag:channel && npm run tag:forum
scripts.tag:load-balancer: cd istrav-load-balancer && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:api: cd istrav-api && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:headless: cd istrav-headless && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:admin: cd istrav-admin && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:marketing: cd istrav-marketing && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:storefront: cd istrav-storefront && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:channel: cd istrav-channel && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:forum: cd istrav-forum && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.init: npm run init:load-balancer && npm run init:api && npm run init:headless && npm run init:admin && npm run init:marketing && npm run init:storefront && npm run init:channel && npm run init:forum
scripts.dev: concurrently -n lb,api,headless,admin,marketing,storefront,channel,forum "npm run dev:load-balancer" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:headless" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:marketing" "npm run dev:storefront" "npm run dev:channel" "npm run dev:forum"
scripts.dev:load-balancer: echo "nginx is only used in production"
scripts.dev:api: cd istrav-api && export PORT=1337; npm start
scripts.dev:headless: cd istrav-headless && export PORT=9999; npm start
scripts.dev:admin: # cd istrav-admin && export PORT=5280; npm run dev
scripts.dev:marketing: # cd istrav-marketing && export PORT=8000; npm run dev
scripts.dev:storefront: # cd istrav-storefront && export PORT=7000; npm run dev
scripts.dev:channel: # cd istrav-channel && export PORT=6000; npm run dev
scripts.dev:forum: # cd istrav-forum && export PORT=5000; npm run dev
